name: GCH Craftsman Bar
location: Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa, Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa

items.title: Fruit Plate
items.description: Sliced Fruit, Local Citrus, Seasonal Berries, Lowfat Cottage Cheese

items.title: Smoked Salmon Bagel Sandwich
items.description: Caper Cream Cheese, Arugula, Tomato and Red Onions on a Toasted Plain Bagel, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: American Breakfast*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Bacon or Sausage, Seasonal Fruit or Breakfast Potatoes and choice of Toast: Wheat, White or Sourdough

items.title: Oatmeal
items.description: Old Fashioned Rolled Oats, Local Berries & Blackstrap Molasses Drizzle

items.title: Egg White Omelet*
items.description: Spinach, Tomato, Turkey Bacon, Avocado, served with Arugula Salad with Cucumber, Feta and Tomato Vinaigrette and Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Eggs, Ham, Potatoes and Melted Cheese on a Toasted Croissant, served with Arugula Salad with Cucumber, Feta and Tomato Vinaigrette

items.title: Belgian Waffle
items.description: Seasonal Compote, Powdered Sugar, Strawberries, Chocolate-Hazelnut Sauce and Chantilly Cream, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Brioche French Toast
items.description: Thick-sliced Brioche with Vanilla-sweetened Mascarpone, Fresh Berries, Powdered Sugar, and Blueberry Compote, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Breakfast Burrito*
items.description: Eggs, Bacon, Potatoes, Pico de Gallo and Cheese wrapped in a Flour Tortilla, Salsa Roja and Sour Cream, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Avocado Toast on Sourdough*
items.description: Poached Eggs, Pomegranate Seeds, Pomegranate Molasses, Olive Oil Drizzle

items.title: Lobster Benedict
items.description: Hollandaise & Caviar, Shaved Asparagus Salad, Champagne Vinaigrette

items.title: POWER Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, a Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots and Whole-Grain "Fish" Crackers served with a choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Kids' American Breakfast*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Turkey Bacon and Potatoes with choice of Seasonal Fruit or Lowfat Yogurt and choice of small Lowfat Milk or small Dasani® Water.

items.title: Kids' Mickey Waffle
items.description: dusted with Powdered Sugar and served with Syrup and choice of small Lowfat Milk or small Dasani® Water

items.title: Strawberry-Basil Smash Mocktail
items.description: Strawberry, Basil, Lime Juice and Sparkling Water, garnished with a Basil Leaf and a Strawberry Fan

items.title: Grapefruit Fizz Mocktail
items.description: Grapefruit Juice, Sparkling Water, Simple Syrup and Orange Juice, garnished with a Thyme Sprig and a half Grapefruit Wheel

items.title: Crafted Bloody Mary or Bloody Maria
La Marca Luminore Prosecco Mimosa
items.description: with choice of Tangerine, Mango or Raspberry Juice

items.title: Schramsberg Blanc de Blancs Mimosa
items.description: with choice of Tangerine, Mango or Raspberry Juice

items.title: Laurent Perrier 'La Cuvée' Mimosa
items.description: with choice of Tangerine, Mango or Raspberry Juice

items.title: Café Especial
items.description: Dark Roasted Coffee, Herradura Balnco Tequila, Kahlúa, Cream, Whipped Cream

items.title: Grand Candied Orange Coffee
items.description: Dark Roasted Coffee, Grand Marnier, Brandy, Kahlúa, Cream, Whipped Cream, Orange Twist

items.title: Seared Salmon Salad*
items.description: Spinach, Mixed Greens, Roasted Tomatoes, Pine Nuts and Avocado with Honey Balsamic Vinaigrette (substitute Flat Iron Steak or Chicken)

items.title: Flat Iron Steak Salad*
items.description: Kale and Romaine, Avocado, Corn, Jicama, Cherry Tomatoes, Cilantro, crispy Tortilla Strips, Toasted Pepitas, Cotija Cheese with Greek yogurt Caesar Dressing (Substitute Salmon or Chicken)

items.title: Avocado Panzanella
items.description: Avocado, Sourdough Bread, Baby Heirloom Tomatoes, Kalamata Olive Crumble, Feta, Arugula and Charred Onion Chimichurri

items.title: Sticky Chicken Wings
items.description: Honey-Soy-Ginger-glazed, served with Steamed Calrose Rice and Pickled Cucumber Slaw

items.title: Baked Nachos
items.description: Choice of Shredded Beef or Chicken, Tortilla Chips, Cheese Sauce, Shredded Cheese, Black Beans, Green Onions, Pickled Jalapeños, Cilantro, Queso Fresco, Avocado, Crema and Salsa Roja

items.title: Lobster Mac and Cheese
items.description: Fresh Elbow Pasta, old Water Lobster Tail, Chedder Cheese Sauce, and Sourdough Gremolata

items.title: Poke Bowl*
items.description: Choice of Sushi Grade Salmon or Tuna tossed in Ponzu with Cucumber, Edamame, Avocado, Crab Salad, Green Onions, Radicchio, Pickled Seaweed, Furikake and Sriracha Aïoli, choice of Calrose Rice or Mixed Greens

items.title: Hot Dog of the Month
items.description: please inquire with Server

items.title: Carne Asada Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled Carne Asada with Melted Cheese, Roasted Corn Relish, Black Beans and Green Onions, wrapped in a Flour Tortilla with Chipotle Crema, Fresno Chile, Cilantro and Limes

items.title: Wagyu Gouda Burger*
items.description: American Wagyu Patty, Gouda, Grilled Red Onion, Lettuce, Tomato and Preserved Lemon Aioli on a Brioche Bun, served with Seasonal Fruit or Seasoned Fries

items.title: Fish and Chips
items.description: Beer-battered Cod with Seasoned Fries, served with Arugula Salad and Malted Vinegar Mayo

items.title: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Fresh Mozzarella, Fresh Basil, Fire-roasted Tomatoes and House Cheese Blend

items.title: Classic Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Premium Pepperoni and House Cheese Blend

items.title: Forest Mushroom Impossible Sausage Pizza
items.description: Roasted Mushrooms, Plant-based Sausage, Mushroom Spread, Caramelized Onions, Green Onions, Fresh Mozzarella and House Cheese Blend

items.title: Charcuterie Pizza
items.description: Premium Pepperoni, Prosciutto, Sausage, Arugula, Fire-roasted Tomatoes and House Cheese Blend

items.title: Classic Sundae
items.description: Vanilla Ice Cream, Chocolate Sauce, Chantilly Cream and Toasted Almonds, topped with a Cherry

items.title: Apple Galette
items.description: Caramel Ice Cream, Vanilla Sauce, Powdered Sugar

items.title: POWER Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, a Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots and Whole-Grain "Fish" Crackers served with a choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Hamburger
items.description: served with a Cuties® Mandarin Orange and a Yogurt Smoothie with a choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Parmesan-crusted Grilled Cheese
items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit or French Fries and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Chicken Tenders
items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit or French Fries and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Strawberry-Basil Smash Mocktail
items.description: Strawberry, Basil, Lime Juice and Sparkling Water, garnished with a Basil Leaf and a Strawberry Fan

items.title: Tropical Ginger Sparkler Mocktail
items.description: Ginger Beer and Lemon, Orange & Pineapple Juices, garnished with an Orange Wheel and a Pineapple Wedge

items.title: Rosemary Pear Spritz Mocktail
items.description: Pear Nectar, Rosemary Syrup and Lemon Juice, garnished with a Rosemary Sprig and a Pear Slice

items.title: Grapefruit Fizz Mocktail
items.description: Grapefruit Juice, Sparkling Water, Simple Syrup and Orange Juice, garnished with a Thyme Sprig and a half Grapefruit Wheel

items.title: Grand Gesture
items.description: Flor de Caña 25yr Rum, Amaro Nonino, Carpano Antica Sweet Vermouth, Averna, Orange Bitters and Burnt Orange Peel Garnish

items.title: Paloma
items.description: Codigo Reposado, Grapefruit Juice, Grapefruit Soda, Lime Juice and Cointreau, garnished with a Lime Wheel

items.title: Grand Mai Tai
items.description: Bacardi Reserva Ocho Rum, Myers's Original Dark Rum, Orange Curaçao, Orgeat and Lime Juice

items.title: Strawberry Basil Daquiri
items.description: Flor de Caña Rum, Strawberry-Basil Syrup and Lime & Lemon Juices

items.title: Passion Fruit Martini
items.description: Bourbon, Lemon Juice, Passion Fruit, Aperol, Thyme

items.title: Craftsman's Garden
items.description: Llegal Mezcal Joven, Lemon Juice and Agave Nectar

items.title: Under the Wisteria
items.description: Hendrick's Gin, Lemon juice, Orgeat Lavender syrup, Grapefruit juice, Topo Chico®

items.title: Watermelon-Cucumber Collins
items.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka, Watermelon Juice, Cucumber, Watermelon Syrup and Lime Juice

items.title: Passion Fruit Mojito
items.description: Flor de Caña Extra Seco 4 Yr Aged Rum, Creme de Fruits de la Passion Liqueur, Passion Fruit Syrup, Lime Juice and Club Soda

items.title: Frozen Rosé
items.description: Daou Rosé, Tito's Handmade Vodka, Strawberry Purée and Shaved Ice

items.title: Wayfinder
items.description: Pineapple-Strawberry Infused Ketel One Vodka, St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur, Grapefruit Juice, Lemon Juice, Grapefruit Bitters and Citrus Syrup

items.description: Casamigos Reposado, Cointreau, Lime Juice and Agave Nectar

items.description: Clase Azul Plata Blanco, Cointreau, Lime Juice and Agave Nectar

items.description: Don Julio 1942, Grand Marnier 100yr, Cointreau, Lime Juice and Agave Nectar
